body:
So I thought I was more popular than I was. Here is a big blob about me.

My name is Alexander I am 12 years old born on November 8th. So I should probably start with what brought me here, I was watching MCFinest in 2012ish and I saw them playing walls which I thought was really cool so I went and watched a whole bunch of other videos about the walls and in the comments I saw this "The server IP is wallsmc.com" I mean it sounded legit so I joined and I played walls like everyday or so. Then I finally ran into the first staff member which was a Jr.Mod and it was MissCarmel and I remember she spawned in a horse... Yeah as horse for some girl who's horse got killed. I did what the normal 9-10 year old would do and said "Can I have mod" and she told me to go on the fourms which I did and they were very confusing at first. The first post I saw was with the title at "OMG I KILLED FUNKY" and I was saying like who the hell cares about funky and then I see he is the owner.. (oops?) Then I applied for a couple of clans, got denied because apparently a 0.4 kd isint good and I met a few people in TS who don't remember me. (Sunny, Emmy XxGamingFoxxX) and BAM I became a so-so active member on the fourms and its pretty fun to be here and be able to talk with everyone. Okay after re-reading this its random garbage so just Ama xDD and my skype is: ItzMeRekt

Original name: YoUrFaCeHaHa, iznot4fun

@XBen_ Don't quite understand that

@Fused Hey
@sheamus4414 Exclusively. I never met him on avi but we played a lot together (2 years).
